OOC: He's watching the Chosen Ones, he plans to make a largwe team, and I h=
ave enough on one side to make an army, soooooo. But if those of yours woul=
d like to join, Shokaract will seek them out...

ber 24, 2000 7:12 PM

pg Main Page  



  (is he watching Dark Prime, Valtron, and Magnus? And I =
really wanted Shokaract)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECOD=
E 
    To: NBW 
    Sent: Sunday, September 24, 2000 12:49 PM
    Subject: =
Shokaract...





    Shokaract stops his walking when he sees a battle. It=
's a battle between lots of tough looking robots and their fighting what se=
ems to be 3 bots who are taking plenty of time and a confident bot who appe=
ared to be losing. Shokaract liked the group of bots, the T-Rex guy was big=
 and mean looking as well. Shokaract was recruiting new members for his tea=
m, he only had himself so far. If these guys were willing to leave the fact=
ion, then a makeshift base could be built and they could rule the Neo Beast=
 Wars. Shokaract sat back and watched...
